discussion.content:
- Because these devices are in-line, stateful devices, they are vulnerable
and targets of DDoS attacks.
- First to be affected by large flood or connection attacks.

look this: http://www.ciscopress.com/articles/article.asp?p=1722559
So, why not DDOS? .. I am not sure about the answers

questions.question_text: Which two attack types can be prevented with the implementation of a Cisco IPS solution? (Choose two.)

questions.answer: D. The isolated port can communicate only with other isolated ports
questions.answer_ET: D. The isolated port can communicate only with other isolated ports

choices.B: The isolated port can communicate only with the promiscuous port
choices.C: The isolated port can communicate with other isolated ports and the promiscuous port
choices.A: The isolated port can communicate only with community ports

questions.question_text: Which statement about a PVLAN isolated port configured on a switch is true?

questions.answer: F. It can generate alerts based on behavior at the desktop level

discussion.content:
Which three statements about host-based IPS are true? (Choose three.)
A. It can view encrypted files.
B. It can have more restrictive policies than network-based IPS.
C. It can generate alerts based on behavior at the desktop level.

questions.answer_ET: F. It can generate alerts based on behavior at the desktop level

choices.D: It can have more restrictive policies than network-based IPS
choices.B: It can be deployed at the perimeter

questions.question_text: Which three statements about host-based IPS are true? (Choose three)
What type of security support is provided by the Open Web Application Security Project?

choices.B: Education about common Web site vulnerabilities
choices.C: A security discussion forum for Web site developers

questions.answer: D. Scoring of common vulnerabilities and exposures
questions.answer_ET: D. Scoring of common vulnerabilities and exposures

questions.question_text: Refer to the exhibit. Which statement about the device time is true?

choices.C: The clock is out of sync
choices.B: The time is authoritative, but the NTP process has lost contact with its servers
choices.A: The time is authoritative because the clock is in sync

questions.answer: E. The time is not authoritative
questions.answer_ET: E. The time is not authoritative
